Title: The Horse Soldiers
Writer: John Lee Mahin (written for the screen by), Martin Rackin (written for the screen by), Harold Sinclair (from the novel by)
Actors: John Wayne, William Holden, Constance Towers, Judson Pratt
Plot: In 1863, a Union outfit is sent behind Confederate lines in Mississippi to destroy enemy railroads but a captive southern belle and the unit's doctor cause frictions within ranks.
